questionTitle: A: This is a present for you. B: ___ . A: You're welcome.
A: Glenn, pass me the salt, please. B: ___
A: Hello. My name is Booker Moore. B: Hi. My name is Winifred Bowles. ___
A: Is Bill there? B: ___ He's out now.
A: Let's go to church next Sunday. B: ___
A: Where are you going? B: ___
A: I want these earrings for my mother. How much are they? B: ___
A: Do you want coffee or hot cocoa? B: ___
A: Erin, Karla and Joel, it's late. You children go to bed, now. B: All right, Mom. ___
A: Pass the salt and pepper, please. B: O.K. ___
